An Introduction to the r2rtf Package

Source: vignettes/r2rtf-cran.Rmd
r2rtf-cran.Rmd

Please see https://merck.github.io/r2rtf/articles/index.html for the full documentation. Here is only a minimal example:

library(dplyr)
library(r2rtf)

head(iris) %>%
  rtf_body() %>%                 # Step 1 Add attributes
  rtf_encode() %>%               # Step 2 Convert attributes to RTF encode
  write_rtf(file = "ex-tbl.rtf") # Step 3 Write to a .rtf file

Developed by Yilong Zhang, Siruo Wang, Simiao Ye, Fansen Kong. Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
